message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant amount to you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $1500000. This is a fair price considering its exceptional features and benefits. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1400000. This price still reflects the product's value and benefits, but it's a compromise that I'm willing to make to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I understand you're still looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1300000. I'm willing to make another compromise, so I'm counteroffering $1350000. This price still reflects the product's value and benefits, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement at this point.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
